last_episode_to_air.name: Bye Bye, Frankie
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the town flocks to the airport for the big Christmas Eve show, Frank scrambles to keep the event on track, and Rosie plots to expose the mayor.

name: F is for Family
overview: Follow the Murphy family back to the 1970s, when kids roamed wild, beer flowed freely and nothing came between a man and his TV.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Frank's career gets an unexpected boost, Sue tries to carve out a new identity and 11-year-old Bill finds trouble waiting around every corner.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As Frank and Sue grapple with money troubles, the Murphy kids face fresh humiliations and confusing rites of passage.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: New neighbors, growing pains and adolescent angst shake up life for the Murphy gang over one wild and unforgettable summer.

episodes.name: The Bleedin' in Sweden
episodes.overview: Desperate to keep his buddies from watching the fight at a neighbor's house, Frank promises an epic big-screen experience. But now he has to deliver.

episodes.name: Saturday Bloody Saturday
episodes.overview: Frank's attempt to teach Kevin a lesson about respect yields unintended results.  Maureen makes babysitting a nightmare for Bill.  Sue finds out selling Plast-a-Ware isn't as fulfilling as she'd like.

episodes.name: The Trough
episodes.overview: Frank makes a powerful friend at a football game and his move into management stirs up trouble with his old work pals.

episodes.name: 'F' is for Halloween
episodes.overview: Halloween is all tricks and no treats as Frank secretly torpedoes Sue's shot at a real job and a bully leaves Bill afraid to don his costume.

episodes.name: Bill Murphy's Day Off
episodes.overview: Bill's surprise attack on the neighborhood bully backfires in a big way. Frank has to swallow his pride to make good on a promise to Kevin.

episodes.name: O Holy Moly Night
episodes.overview: Christmas Eve turns chaotic as Frank's deal to avoid a strike hits a last-minute snag and Bill's first stint as an altar boy leads to trouble.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Frank's career gets an unexpected boost, Sue tries to carve out a new identity and 11-year-old Bill finds trouble waiting around every corner.

episodes.name: Heavy Sledding
episodes.overview: As Frank stews over his lost job, Sue tries to lighten the mood with a family sledding trip. But the outing brings on more headaches.

episodes.name: A Girl Named Sue
episodes.overview: Frank's big meeting doesn't play out quite like expected. Fed up with plasticware parties, Sue begins to fantastize about a change.

episodes.name: The Liar's Club
episodes.overview: Sue discovers a major downside of office life, Frank sucks it up for a trip to the unemployment line, and Kevin finally gets a space of his own.

episodes.name: Night Shift
episodes.overview: As Frank scrambles to prove himself at a new job, Kevin and his band plot to get their song on the radio. Sue has a Plast-a-Ware brainstorm.

episodes.name: Breaking Bill
episodes.overview: Kevin's dreams of rock stardom stir up trouble at home. A setback the day before hockey tryouts pushes Bill over the edge. Sue gives her big pitch.

episodes.name: This Is Not Good
episodes.overview: Frank's job takes him back to the airport, with awkward results. Kevin prepares for his date with "haircut girl". Bill revels in his new outlaw ways.

episodes.name: Fight Night
episodes.overview: Sue meets with the queen of Plast-a-Ware and plans a romantic night out with Frank. But a call from Maureen's school triggers a family meltdown.

episodes.name: F Is for Fixing It
episodes.overview: As Sue and Frank try to hash things out, Kevin is wracked with guilt over the incident at Vic's. Bill comes face to face with his old nemesis.

episodes.name: Pray Away
episodes.overview: A couple's retreat leads to a moment of truth for Frank and Sue. Bill and Phillip hatch a plan to deal with Jimmy. Suprises abound at Vic's party.

episodes.name: Landing the Plane
episodes.overview: Sue gears up for her big moment at the shareholders' meeting, while Frank and friends lay a trap for Scoop. But the day takes a dramatic turn.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: As Frank and Sue grapple with money troubles, the Murphy kids face fresh humiliations and confusing rites of passage.

episodes.name: Are You Ready for the Summer?
episodes.overview: The Murphys kick off summer with a trip to the town Memorial Day parade, where bottled-up frustrations and fears about the new baby boil over.

episodes.name: Paul Lynde to Block
episodes.overview: Sue's hopes of a romantic night with Frank at the drive-in are dashed when he brings the new neighbors along. Kevin's bandmates drop a bombshell.

episodes.name: The Stinger
episodes.overview: Sue dreams up a new invention, Kevin starts summer school, Bill suffers an awkward mishap at the pool, and a promotion stokes tensions at the airport.

episodes.name: Mr. Murphy's Wild Ride
episodes.overview: As the guys start work on the baby's room, Chet takes Frank on an unforgettable outing to the Air Force base. A jealous Phillip lashes out at Bill.

episodes.name: Battle of the Sexes
episodes.overview: While Sue hosts a soul-crushing focus group for the Forkoontula, Frank tries to keep Vic from bonding with Chet, and Bill sneaks out with Bridget.

episodes.name: Punch Drunk
episodes.overview: Frank can't wait to party with his new best bud on the Fourth of July, but rising tensions between Chet and Sue set off the wrong kind of fireworks.

episodes.name: Summer Vacation
episodes.overview: The family's summer trip to a lakeside cabin takes one vexing turn after another, and Kevin relives a traumatic childhood moment.

episodes.name: It's In His Blood
episodes.overview: An unwelcome surprise sends Frank's bromance with Chet into a tailspin. Maureen and Phillip train for their big day. Bill's breakup gets messy.

episodes.name: Frank the Father
episodes.overview: After bailing Kevin out, Frank tries a new parenting tactic. Meanwhile, Maureen's shot at TV fame hits a snag, and Bill weighs a big decision.

episodes.name: Bill Murphy's Night Off
episodes.overview: As the Murphys and their neighbors scour the city, Bill bounces from one harrowing ordeal to the next. Rosie's debate turns into a rescue mission.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: New neighbors, growing pains and adolescent angst shake up life for the Murphy gang over one wild and unforgettable summer.

episodes.name: Father Confessor
episodes.overview: A surprise visit from his estranged dad sends Frank off the deep end — and into the confession booth.

episodes.name: Nothing Is Impossible
episodes.overview: On back-to-school night, Frank stews over flashbacks to his fourth-grade play, while Sue fights to get Kevin into a special program for "dim lights."

episodes.name: Bring Me a Tooth
episodes.overview: Frank struggles to make good on his promises to Bill and Maureen. Vic gets a rude surprise on his first day back at the radio station.

episodes.name: The 'B' Word
episodes.overview: A lunch date sends Sue even deeper into a funk, Bill discovers a different side of his grandfather, and a desperate Vic offers to record Kevin's band.

episodes.name: Just Breathe
episodes.overview: While Frank and his dad tend to an emergency at the airport, Sue spends a maddening night at the hospital, and Bill takes a beating in the hockey rink.

episodes.name: Come to Papa
episodes.overview: Frank's pledge to be a better father and husband is tested by one calamity after the next, leading to an epic meltdown at Lamaze class.

episodes.name: R Is For Rosie
episodes.overview: Eager to make his mark as an alderman, Rosie heads to City Hall — only to find out the crooked mayor has his own plans for the Twelfth Ward.

episodes.name: Murphy & Son
episodes.overview: A string of good luck lifts the mood at the Murphy house. But a family outing to the fourth-grade play unleashes a fresh wave of chaos.

episodes.name: Land Ho!
episodes.overview: While Frank and the Mohican crew head to X-ray training in Cleveland, Vic gives Kevin and the band a total makeover for Kweezetoberfest.

episodes.name: Baby, Baby, Baby
episodes.overview: As Sue sets out on a star-crossed trek to the hospital, Frank races to catch a flight home — and vows to settle things with his dad once and for all.

episodes.name: The Mahogany Fortress
episodes.overview: At a family funeral, Frank deals with bottled-up emotions, Maureen befriends an embalmer, and Bill discovers the last rites can wipe away any sin.

episodes.name: The Rustvale Massacre
episodes.overview: While Sue tries to broker a peace deal with her dad, Frank meets the new airline management, and Bill and Maureen get into mischief on a field trip.

episodes.name: Blind Alley
episodes.overview: Sue hits the bars to look for her brother. Bill spends his Saturdays in a "scared straight" program. Kevin gets clingy after learning about Alice's ex.

episodes.name: Thank You So Much
episodes.overview: On Thanksgiving, Sue stresses over her family's visit, Vic begs his neighbors for help soothing the baby, and Bob's big dream suffers a setback.

episodes.name: The Searchers
episodes.overview: When Frank ducks out of a family day to scour the city for Box 16, Sue goes to a party at Vic's house. Bill and friends enjoy the perks of police life.

episodes.name: Screw Ups
episodes.overview: Sue takes Maureen to church to cure her obsession with the occult, Frank gives Bill an overdue sex talk, and Kevin pours his heart out to Smokey.

episodes.name: A Very Merry F***ing Christmas
episodes.overview: Inspired by his dad's words, Frank throws himself into a project at work. Sue starts a new business. The mayor takes his feud with Rosie too far.

episodes.name: Bye Bye, Frankie
episodes.overview: As the town flocks to the airport for the big Christmas Eve show, Frank scrambles to keep the event on track, and Rosie plots to expose the mayor.
